artist: Artist: Seth Tobocman; Author: Sander Hicks; Publisher: Sander Hicks , New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, three columns of letterpress text with several photomechanical images and designs printed in color offset lithography on coated newsprint; 8 pp.
medium: Letterpress, color offset lithography; loose, doled leaves
title: The New York Megaphone, vol. 3, issue 1
